document_data.name: Lady's Hall (Ordulin)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lady's Hall''', which was also called '''Luck House''' by the non-devout, was a temple dedicated to [[Tymora]] located in the city of [[Ordulin]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was run by High Priestess [[Duatha Lindar]]. Duatha was assisted by 16 other priests and 24 followers.
